name: chatwoot
description: Chatwoot is an open-source customer engagement suite that provides live chat, shared inboxes, social media integration, and automation. It offers multi-channel communication and is a viable alternative to Intercom or Zendesk.
features: Customer Engagement: Complete suite for customer communication. All-in-one platform.
Live Chat: Real-time chat widget for your website. Instant support.
Shared Inbox: Team inbox for email, chat, and social media. Unified communication.
Social Integration: Connect Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, and more. Multi-channel.
Automation: Chatbots and automated workflows. Efficient support.
Intercom Alternative: Open-source alternative to expensive platforms. Cost-effective.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over customer data. Privacy guaranteed.
